name: Tetori
enabledFormula: !@modifies:ability:high_jump#monk AND !@modifies:ability:tongue_of_the_sun_and_moon#monk AND !@modifies:ability:flurry_of_blows#monk AND !@modifies:ability:slow_fall#monk AND !@modifies:ability:empty_body#monk AND !@modifies:ability:diamond_soul#monk AND !@modifies:ability:abundant_step_improved_evasion_timeless_body#monk

description.text: The style of the tetori is that of the majestic wrestler--a warrior with a dizzying array of grabs, holds, and locks with which to bewilder and incapacitate his foes.
